definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The press has different attitudes towards cooperation between the world's two major automobile manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 輿論界對世界兩大汽車製造商的合作褒貶不一。

sentences.english: The majority of the press support the Government's policy.
sentences.chinese: 輿論界多數支持政府的政策。

sentences.english: The president is upset that the press second-guesses his new policy.
sentences.chinese: 總統對輿論界猜測他的新政策感到不悅。
